## QCloudCredential interface

永久密钥

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface QCloudCredential 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [SecretId](./tencentcloud-cls-uploader-sdk.qcloudcredential.secretid.md) |  | string | 用户的 SecretId，建议使用子账号密钥，授权遵循最小权限指引，降低使用风险。子账号密钥获取可参见 https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/37140 |
|  [SecretKey](./tencentcloud-cls-uploader-sdk.qcloudcredential.secretkey.md) |  | string | 用户的 SecretKey，建议使用子账号密钥，授权遵循最小权限指引，降低使用风险。子账号密钥获取可参见 https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/37140 |
